value:
During my search for Lord Leif, I
happened upon Lord Ced. I was lucky
enough to learn wind magic from him.

In Hrest, Lord Leif and I swore an
oath. Though it might mean our
deaths, we would take back Thracia.

Agh! Sorry...I was completely
absorbed in this tome. Are you
hurt? Did you need something?

I have heard that many esteemed
magic users are gathered here.
Would you introduce me to them?

I've been borrowing lots of books...
I must study hard to be of use off
the battlefield as well as on.

So you're $Nu...
I hear you're a
stalwart friend.

I see... This is the true power of
the magic Lord Ced taught me!

I may be inexperienced, but...
I will show that this magic has
its purpose!
Is it true? Am I too weak to help?

If you believe I may be of some
use, then I'll make every effort
to prove you right!

I am Asbel, of the Magi. I will do my
utmost to put the magic Lord Ced
taught me to use on your behalf.

I've improved at using magic, and
it's all because of you. I can't thank
you enough!$k$pI've come to realize, though, that
fighting can't be my only job on
the battlefield.$k$pYou don't fight, but are so talented
at leading others. You draw out their
potential and help them thrive.$k$pWith skills like those, I could help
Lord Leif and Lord Ced on the path
toward peace...$k$pSo, it's decided. I will become your
student!$k$pUntil I master these skills, I swear
that I won't leave your side. Er, if
that's all right by you, of course!
たあっ
お返しです！
わあっ
やられた…！
For Thracia!
We WILL take it back!
Life or death!
I'll make it back.
Liberation…
Haha
We finally meet! I am Asbel.
*yelp* *sigh* I'm no fan of childish games.
To me, Leif is someone with great significance...
I made a promise...a promise that we would work together to take back Thracia.
Do you mean to imply that that promise was nothing more than the fancy of a child?
Ced, we'll meet again someday. Won't we...?
Let me be of help to you! No matter the hardship, I'm ready.
Understood.
What to do...
I'll break through!
